step1.para: If previously removed, install the small O-ring in the cylinder housing bore ( Figure 176).

figure.caption: Figure 176. Install Small O-Ring in Cylinder Housing Bore

step1.para: If removed, install the O-ring on the piston O.D. ( left, Figure 177). Insert the yoke bar in the cylinder housing bore ( right, Figure 177).

figure.caption: Figure 177. Install O-Ring on Piston O.D. and Insert Yoke Bar in Cylinder Housing Bore

step1.para: If previously removed, install the insert valve, flat end to the outside, and the valve retaining nut in the bottom bore of the cylinder cover ( Figure 178). Tighten to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 178. Install Insert Valve and Valve Retaining Nut

note.para: Prior to installation of the insert valve, make sure the three O-rings on the valve O.D. are not defective. Replace, if necessary.

step1.para: Place the new splitter cylinder gasket, splitter cylinder assembly, new splitter cylinder cover gasket and splitter cylinder cover onto the auxiliary housing ( Figure 179). Install 4 bolts into the assembly and tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N· m).

figure.caption: Figure 179. Place New Splitter Cylinder Gasket, Assembly, Cover Gasket and Cover onto Auxiliary Housing
